含义: The character '友' means 'friend' or 'friendship'. It represents the concept of mutual support, companionship, and goodwill between people.
字形: The character '友' consists of two parts: the left part is a simplified form of '又' (yòu), meaning 'again' or 'also', and the right part is '又' as well. Together, they symbolize two hands reaching out to each other, representing friendship.
读音: The pronunciation of '友' is 'yǒu' in Mandarin Chinese, with the third tone.
字源: The character '友' originates from ancient pictographs depicting two hands clasped together, symbolizing mutual assistance and camaraderie. Over time, it evolved into its current form.
成语: 良师益友 (liáng shī yì yǒu, a good teacher and a helpful friend)
狐朋狗友 (hú péng gǒu yǒu, bad friends)
患难之交 (huàn nàn zhī jiāo, friendship forged in adversity)
莫逆之交 (mò nì zhī jiāo, bosom friends)
例句: 他是我的好朋友。 (Tā shì wǒ de hǎo péngyǒu. He is my good friend.)
友谊地久天长。 (Yǒuyì dìjiǔ tiāncháng. May friendship last forever.)
朋友之间要互相帮助。 (Péngyǒu zhījiān yào hùxiāng bāngzhù. Friends should help each other.)
短故事: In ancient China, two scholars, Li Bai and Du Fu, shared a deep friendship. Despite their different personalities, they supported each other through thick and thin, writing poems that celebrated their bond. Their friendship is often cited as an example of true camaraderie.

A famous story from the 'Three Kingdoms' period tells of Liu Bei, Guan Yu, and Zhang Fei, who became sworn brothers in the Peach Garden. Their friendship and loyalty to each other became legendary, symbolizing the ideal of brotherhood and mutual support.
诗词: 《赠汪伦》 - 李白 (To Wang Lun - Li Bai): '李白乘舟将欲行，忽闻岸上踏歌声。桃花潭水深千尺，不及汪伦送我情。' (Li Bai is about to depart by boat when he hears singing from the shore. The depth of the Peach Blossom Pool is a thousand feet, but it cannot compare to Wang Lun's friendship.)
《送杜少府之任蜀州》 - 王勃 (Farewell to Vice-Prefect Du - Wang Bo): '海内存知己，天涯若比邻。' (If you have a friend who understands you, even the ends of the earth feel like next door.)
